sig_info: Civil Warrior begins the fight with 2 indefinite Armor Up Buffs.

Blocking during the opponent’s Special Attack inflicts them with a Passive Weakness, reducing their Attack Rating by 10 to 50%. This is also true if Civil Warrior was Blocking prior to a Special Attack 3.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Civil Warrior’s combination of Super Soldier Serum and advanced Stark Tech renders him Immune to Nullify and Stagger effects.
For each Armor Up Buff active on Civil Warrior, reduce the opponent’s Bleed and Poison Ability Accuracy by 25%.
PERSONAL ARMOR UP BUFFS: Unless otherwise stated, Civil Warrior’s Armor Up Buffs provide +177.78 Armor Rating and last 11 seconds.
ALL ATTACKS: Every 5th basic attack that either Champion throws has a 100% chance to grant 1 Armor Up Buff.
DASH BACK AND HOLD BLOCK FOR 1.2 SECONDS: Civil Warrior converts all of his Armor Up Buffs into Fury Buffs, with each providing +9.96 Attack Rating for 12 seconds.
These Fury Buffs have a Max Stack of 50 and are Refreshed each time an Armor Up Buff is converted this way.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to inflict a 10 second Heal Block Debuff, preventing the target from recovering Health.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: When launched: Pause all Armor Up Buffs for 20 seconds.
On hit: Pause all Heal Block Debuffs on the opponent for 6 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain up to 4 Armor Up Buff(s). 100% chance each.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to Power Burn 2 Bar(s) of Power, dealing direct damage proportional to the amount of Power lost.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: The opponent is Passively Power Locked during this attack.
100% chance to inflict Power Drain, removing 1 Bar(s) of Power. If the target is reduced to 0 Power, they also receive a Power Lock Debuff for 10 seconds, preventing them from gaining Power.

DASH BACK AND HOLD BLOCK FOR 1.2 SECONDS: Civil Warrior converts all of his Armor Up Buffs into Fury Buffs, with each providing +217.2 Attack Rating for 12 seconds.
These Fury Buffs have a Max Stack of 50 and are Refreshed each time an Armor Up Buff is converted this way.
HEAVY ATTACKS: 100% chance to inflict a 10 second Heal Block Debuff, preventing the target from recovering Health.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: When launched: Pause all Armor Up Buffs for 20 seconds.
On hit: Pause all Heal Block Debuffs on the opponent for 6 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Gain up to 4 Armor Up Buff(s). 100% chance each.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to Power Burn 2 Bar(s) of Power, dealing direct damage proportional to the amount of Power lost.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: The opponent is Passively Power Locked during this attack.
100% chance to inflict Power Drain, removing 1 Bar(s) of Power. If the target is reduced to 0 Power, they also receive a Power Lock Debuff for 10 seconds, preventing them from gaining Power.

sig_info: Civil Warrior begins the fight with 2 indefinite Armor Up Buffs.

Blocking during the opponent’s Special Attack inflicts them with a Passive Weakness, reducing their Attack Rating by 15 to 60%. This is also true if Civil Warrior was Blocking prior to a Special Attack 3.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Civil Warrior’s combination of Super Soldier Serum and advanced Stark Tech renders him Immune to Nullify and Stagger effects.
For each Armor Up Buff active on Civil Warrior, reduce the opponent’s Bleed and Poison Ability Accuracy by 25%.
